title: Fix test compatibility after Qdrant migration
description:
After migrating from SimpleVectorStore to QdrantVectorStore, several tests fail due to:
1. Qdrant requires UUID point IDs but ChunkPersistenceTransform uses hash:seq format
2. Test fixtures use in-memory Qdrant which may have different behavior
3. Some tests don't properly set up chunk_fts table

Follow-up from Qdrant migration (catalog-26 through catalog-30).
